description: The Brainwavz Gypsum is a stylish headphone stand that will look good in a home or office setting. The stand can accommodate large or small cup size headphones and wide or narrow headphone bands.The Gypsum uses 6mm thick plastic giving it a solid and sturdy feel, its shape makes the stand quite stable and able to balance heavy headphones without falling over. All Brainwavz Gypsum stands are hand crafted, as such there maybe slight variations between stands but this does not affect the look of the stand.Package contents:1 x Brainwavz Gypsum Headphone Stand
title: Brainwavz Gypsum Headphone Stand For All Headphone Sizes
